Key Match Events: Paul van Meekeren took 4 wickets for 23 runs
Taskin Ahmed scored 11 runs off 35 balls
Paul van Meekeren's fielding contribution in dismissing Taskin Ahmed
Post-Match Reflections: Shakib Al Hasan said Bangladesh was sloppy in the field and struggled with the bat throughout the tournament
Scott Edwards commented that the team felt confident and aimed for around 220+ to have a chance
Paul van Meekeren praised the team effort and credited the bowlers for their contributions
Deepak Sapra mentioned that Eden Gardens is known for memorable matches, and this one will be remembered for the Netherlands
Miscellaneous Highlights: Bangladesh captain Shakib Al Hasan acknowledged that the team was poor with the bat and fielding
Wesley Barresi, Sybrand Engelbrecht, and Logan van Beek played important knocks
Paul van Meekeren took career-best figures
